column4: how many terminal torrent client application exist? i know rtorrent, any others?
does it support to choose which files to download?
um do you have a link? :)
eh, i like to read before installing something :P
the website is sadly uninformative. but basically, it's a curses torrent client written in Python. and with a few more features than the mailine BT client.
how's your httpd-fu? could you get apache and php running on your local machine without problems?
there's always the xampp package if i can't :P
i use this. it uses btornado as the backend, and is easily administerable from a browser. - http://www.torrentflux.com/
about that web frontend.. where can i find that?
see above, and hence my question about your httpd skills (or lack thereof) ;)
